flawed_nl_solution:
The lawyer worked 50*2=<<50*2=100>>100 hours out of court
So he worked 100+50=<<100+50=150>>150 hours total
That means the hourly time cost 150*100=$<<150*100=150000>>150000
Adding the upfront cost it was 150000+1000=$<<150000+1000=151000>>151000
His brother paid half so he paid 151000/2=$<<151000/2=75500>>75500
#### 75500

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15000, not 150000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
